name: Kirby Run
description:
How To Play

Use the arrow keys to move Kirby around or make him jump.

The objective of the game is to collect as many coins as you can. The bronze coins are worth 3 points, the silver coins are worth 6 points and the gold coins are worth 9 points. Make sure you do not fall into any holes, if you do you, will lose a life and restart the level. You will start off the game with 3 lives but will continue to lose them throughout the game or earn some by collecting a life. To complete a level you must reach the star, when you do reach the star you will be teleported to another room.
